description: This simple dinner-for-one recipe is so delicious you'll be glad you don't have to share. It can easily be doubled so you can put another meal in the freezer.
name: Sweet Potato & Lentil Curry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stir spinach into curry and cook for 1 minute or until wilted. Spoon rice into bowl. Serve topped with curry, remaining chilli and coriander.
